title: Missing XP Boost "old ip boost"
body: I update lol client and remarked that all boost are missing. Can you help me with that?

replies.body: Anyone with IP boosts had them converted to XP boosts instead, since IP has been converted to BE.  Let me know if that clears things up!
Anyone but no me. Still i don't get my boosts. This boosts are from old referral system.
